3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Julie Germain - Agt: 925-849-2884 - Delightful view of greenery, park and sky, is ready for you to sit back and enjoy in this light filled home. This Golden Gate model is a sought after single row unit that provides easy access thru atrium to carport just steps away. Level-in access from front door makes this unit a home you can spend your time in for years to come. The home has great bones and is ready for you to make it your own. Many residents enjoy the advantages of owning a Cooperative with the HOA maintaining not only the exterior, roof and grounds but also the HVAC and most appliances. Rossmoor residents take advantage of the amenities including the remodeled Fitness Center, golf (two courses), swimming (several pools), bocce ball, tennis, pickle ball, table tennis, art-ceramics-woodworking-lapidary studios, game room (Bridge, Mah Jong ...) as well as over 200 clubs and organizations. Several clubhouses offer places to socialize. Furthermore, Creekside Bar and Grill sits center stage in Rossmoor near the large Event Center where many dinners, dances, concerts, lectures are enjoyed. It is all about you now and how you want to spend your time!  Won't last ... call now! Carport 103-3

Rossmoor Addendum One includes Buyer Membership Fee $12,500, GRF membership fee financial purchasing requirements, carport 103-3, FWCM (HOA) info. and more. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Elizabeth Haslam - Agt: 925-899-5097 - Don’t miss this rare Earlshall at The Waterford building in Rossmoor, the premier active-adult community in the Bay Area. This lovely two bed, two bath condo is in pristine condition with updates throughout. In the Kitchen you'll find stylish stone counters, updated cabinet fronts, slow closing drawers, and pull-out shelves in the cabinets. Watch your favorite morning show over breakfast on the TV installed at the breakfast bar.  A Dining Room with custom cabinets is just off the Kitchen and open to the expansive Living Room. Both Bathrooms have updated vanities and Toto toilets and the Primary Bathroom has a generous stall shower for easy access with glass shower doors. Storage space abounds with a large walk-in closet and reach-in closet in the Primary Bedroom, hall linen closet, large closet in the Dining Room and a secured storage space just down the hall. Enjoy the Eastern exposure and tree-lined views from every window and the property's two private decks. Updated heat pump for energy savings. The elevator to the main Dining Room and amenities is just a couple steps out the front door. A delicious daily meal in the Dining Room is just one of the many services provided. Waterford residents enjoy their own in-house amenities like a Library, Media Room, Beauty Shop and more.

Park in underground garage parking space #31 and press vertical, silver disabled door opener plate to access North elevator 3. Elevator to dining area and amenities (North elevator 4) is just to the left when leaving the property. Storage closet is #3M-B down the hall to the left when leaving unit. Dues include daily meal for one person and weekly cleaning service.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Drew A Plaisted - Agt: 925-639-9929 - This beautiful Cascade model is situated facing the golf course. It's a rare single-level, level-in version of the Cascade, and it offers both a garage and a carport conveniently located just outside the front door. The living room is surprisingly spacious for a level-in condo and features a vaulted ceiling, adding to the sense of openness. Additionally, an extra spacious den has been added, increasing the model's square footage by over 200 square feet.The unit has been updated with modern features such as smooth ceilings, Luxury Vinyl Plank (LVP) flooring, recessed LED lighting, and fresh paint. Outside, the expanded patio has been recently refinished with new slate tiles, providing a wonderful outdoor space overlooking the golf course. The primary bathroom has been remodeled so that the shower is larger and easier to access, even for someone who needs the assistance of walker.For those who enjoy walking to various activities, this unit is impressively close to the clubhouses and fitness center, making it a convenient choice for active residents.

Remarks: Located in the heart of the vibrant Rossmoor 55+ community, this 2BR/1.5BA level-in Golden Gate floor plan offers a quiet, serene setting with an inviting open floor plan perfect for relaxation and entertaining. ​​The bright and expansive South-facing living room with large picture windows, recessed lighting and crown molding, flooded with natural light, flows into the kitchen and dining room. The updated kitchen features granite counters, custom cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. The primary bedroom draws beautiful light from the serene center patio. The sun-filled center patio provides the perfect retreat for those lazy Sunday mornings. Freshly painted walls, in-unit laundry, and carport with storage complete the home. From athletic activities like swimming, tennis, and golf to seminars, concerts, and musical entertainment, the Rossmoor community provides many opportunities for community-building and leisure activities. Rossmoor has more than 200 clubs and organizations that span nearly every interest from politics, dance, entertainment, literature, and fitness. Rossmoor provides a unique opportunity to experience the next step in your life journey!
